search_results.title: Longtime music director at Michigan church fired for same- ...
search_results.snippet: Fred Szczepanski said he was fired on Oct. 18 by the Rev. Michael Lingaur for marrying his longtime partner in a same-sex ceremony in Nevada in 2020.

search_results.title: Michigan church fires beloved music director after learning ...
search_results.snippet: A beloved music director at a Michigan catholic church was fired after an unknown source informed church officials of his same-sex marriage.
